mapper.sql: id, account, username, user_department, user_mailbox, user_description, login, tenant_id, deleted, ctime, crname, mtime, chname, session_id
mapper.select:
select * from tscm_user where deleted = 0
and account like '%'||#{param.account}||'%'
and username like '%'||#{param.username}||'%'
and user_department like '%'||#{param.userDepartment}||'%'
and user_mailbox like '%'||#{param.userMailbox}||'%'
and user_description like '%'||#{param.userDescription}||'%'
and login = #{param.login}
and session_id like '%'||#{param.sessionId}||'%'
